description:
Free news articles narrated by professionals. Listen to our ever growing catalog of articles from the world’s best publishers and bloggers narrated by professional voice-actors. Whether commuting, working out at the gym, or cooking at home, let Umano accompany you and enrich your day. This app is perfect for you if you like podcasts, listen to audio books or prefer to consume other audio content on the go.

Time: "Umano: One of 50 Best iPhone Apps of 2013"
Forbes: "Umano. Can you think of a better way to pass the time on a commute?"

Key features:
► Your daily headline news and thousands of articles narrated by REAL people
► Enjoy a wide selection of articles from Technology to Lifestyle
► Simple and intuitive design. Ideal for using while on-the-go.
► Build your own playlist or let Umano create one for you based on your interest or time available.
► Download capabilities for offline listening. 
► See what your friends are listening to and share articles with friends via Email, SMS, Twitter or Facebook. Friends can listen, even if they don't have Umano!
► Slick car mode designed for a perfect in-car experience
► And many more...

Download today and join the Umano community!

Umano is free to download and use. Umano Premium adds the great features above and is available through an auto-renewing subscription.

Subscription option:
◦ Umano Premium monthly for $3.99

Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your iTunes account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You will not be able to cancel a subscription during the active period. Manage your subscriptions in the Account Settings after purchase.

Umano Terms: http://umanoapp.com/terms
Umano Privacy: http://umanoapp.com/privacy
trackCensoredName: Umano: Listen to News Articles for Free
trackName: Umano: Listen to News Articles for Free
releaseNotes:
- All new design: We redesigned the listening mode to make it easier to listen hands free
- New Profiles: Recommend interesting articles that your followers can listen to
- Interactive Notifications: Add articles to your playlist directly from notifications
- Today Extension: Access Personalized, Popular and Playlist from a convenient Today widget
- Updates for iPhone 6/6 Plus
- Umano Premium: Added Yearly subscription option
